DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether BMS-708163 will effect the pharmacokinetics of the commonly prescribed medicines midazolam, warfarin, caffeine,omeprazole and dextromethorphan
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With a Potential Alzheimer's Disease Compound
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subjects 1845 yrs old inclusive Women
